categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The miner and bartender Okadiah Garson owned a flophouse opposite his cantina The Asteroid Belt in Gorse City on the planet Gorse. His tenant Kanan Jarrus was one of the residents. Later, Kanan's rebel friends Hera Syndulla, Skelly, and Zaluna Myder hid there after escape Count Denetrius Vidian's Imperial forces.
